briefdescription.para: Initialises the pass and all it's dependencies.
Cleans up the pass and all it's dependencies.
Removes the TextureUnit at the given index.

parameterdescription.para: the index of the TextureUnit to remove.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the TextureUnit at the given index.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the TextureUnit to retrieve.

simplesect.para: The retrieved TextureUnit, nullptr if none.

briefdescription.para: Tells if the pass needs alpha blending.

simplesect.para: true if at least one texture unit has an alpha channel.

briefdescription.para: Tells if the pass needs alpha test.

simplesect.para: true if the alpha func is not Always.

briefdescription.para: Sets the subsurface scattering extended informations.

simplesect.para: Passes are aligned on float[4], so the size of a pass is the number of float[4] needed to contain it.

briefdescription.para: Fills the pass buffer with this pass data.
